newsitem.title: USA: Country Maid Foods Q3 Dec 31 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Country Maid Foods Q3 Dec 31 net rises.

text.p: Country Maid Foods Inc said Thursday its net income for the third quarter was $412,909, up from $67,645.

The agricultural company said earnings per share for the quarter were about $0.01, based on about 50 million shares outstanding. It added that earnings per share figures for other periods were not available.
Revenue for the company was $3.9 million in the third quarter, compared with $1.1 million a year ago.

Net income for the first nine months of fiscal 1997 was $408,310, compared with a loss of $183,647, the company said. Revenue for the period was $5.9 million, compared with $2.6 million in the year ago period, the company said.
